newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombian peso dips one peso in volatile session.
newsitem.headline: Colombian peso dips one peso in volatile session.

text.p: BOGOTA, May 2 Reuter - Colombia's peso fell by one peso to 1,071.8 against the dollar Friday in volatile markets driven by speculation, interbank traders said.
"Banks were finally forced to come out and buy after they had oversold on dollars," one trader said, adding that there had been downward pressure on the U.S. unit in early trading.
Most of the dollar inflows were thanks to the coffee sector ploughing export earnings back into the market.
Dealers reported 355 trades worth a total $140 million. The peso hit an intraday high of 1,067 and sank to a low of 1,072. ((-- Juan Guillermo Londono, Bogota newsroom, 571 610 7944))
